description: Hancoin Finance is a cutting-edge web3-based charity project focused on supporting and developing children's education, culture, and sports. It's the first token built for foundations and non-profit organizations to support each other on the binance smart chain (Bep-20). Hancoin offers free tokens to those who help develop the project, and all charity-funded projects will be made public. The token is eco-friendly, fast, and secure with a supply of 10 billion tokens, including 66% allocated to charity.Hancoin Finance is growing rapidly and listed on leading crypto platforms like BscScan and PancakeSwap. The team plans to exponentially expand their reach and work with organizations and charity firms to integrate Hancoin cryptocurrency to bring positive and effective change.The future is bright for Hancoin Finance, with upcoming goals like charity donations, advisory board appointments, massive foundations involvement, and listings on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
